text: w'idha rak hwla' almukadhibun - 'ayuha alrasul - asthzwu bik qaylyn: ahdha aldhy yazeum 'ana allah baeathah rasulana 'ilyna? 'iinah qarib 'ana ysrfna ean eibadat asnamna biquat hjth wbyanh, lawla 'an thabatna ealaa ebadtha, wasawf yaelamun hin yarawn ma ysthqwn min aledhab: man 'adalu dynana 'ahamu 'am mhmd?
